setTrap(String) - Method in class HomeAlone.business.Game
Intermediary between presentation layer and Player This method checks Game.status using Game.checkStatus(), calls the methods Game.checkForKevin(Nonplayer npc) and Game.walkPath(Nonplayer npc) for both Nonplayer oblects and then calls the method Player.placeTrap(java.lang.String).
